title: Biggest Free Agent Splashes; Steelers sign Trubisky; Colts QB targets
itunes:title: Biggest Free Agent Splashes; Steelers sign Trubisky; Colts QB targets
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Peter Schrager, Kyle Brandt, and Super Bowl champion Shaun O'Hara examine which NFL team has made the biggest splash in free agency. Then Tom Pelissero runs through a list of the top defensive free agents available and the crew gets things off their chest, specifically about Baker Mayfield, Gardner Minshew and the eyeballs emoji. They also share their reactions to the Pittsburgh Steelers signing of Mitch Trubisky and they finish up discussing who the Indianapolis Colts should target as their next starting quarterback.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
